Our Story

At Origins, we keep it simple.

Dr. Sarah Smith started Origins with one big idea aimed at one ultimate outcome. Take the most enjoyable rituals which exist and pair them with advanced nutritional formulas to help you achieve the best health of your life.

Because we believe you deserve to have the body and life you were made for. So nothing holds you back from living your best life.

Our products do just that. Using only the highest quality ingredients which are a dream to use. Then being by your side with guidance to achieve that which you never thought possible.

90-Day Money-Back Guarantee

Every Origins Diet product is backed by our full 90 day money-back promise. If for any reason you're no blown away by the way you look and feel using our products, we'll happily refund your entire purchase. We make this promise as we're confident you'll get the results you deserve.
